verses.roman:
ei mata anubhava āmāra pratīta
vicāri' dekhiye yadi, saba viparīta

synonyms: ei mata—in this way; anubhava—affectionate feelings; āmāra—My; pratīta—understood; vicāri'-by consideration; dekhiye—I see; yadi—if; saba—everything; viparīta—contrary.
translation: "In this way My affectionate feelings for Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī may be understood, but on analysis I find them contradictory.
